CustomField.description:
The participant's attendance score (percentage), calculated using the same Apex code performing attendance calculations in the My Ambition community.
Full details of the calculation can be found here: https://oegenlimited.atlassian.net/browse/AS-157
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The participant's attendance score (percentage), calculated using the same Apex code performing attendance calculations in the My Ambition community.
CustomField.label: Attendance Score
